thread.title: Perrie Edwards And Joey Essex ‘Dating After Meeting At Pride Of Britain Awards'
thread.title_full: Perrie Edwards And Joey Essex ‘Dating After Meeting At Pride Of Britain Awards'

author: Rachel McGrath
title: Perrie Edwards And Joey Essex ‘Dating After Meeting At Pride Of Britain Awards'
text:
Perrie Edwards And Joey Essex ‘Dating After Meeting At Pride Of Britain Awards' The Huffington Post UK | By Rachel McGrath reddit 
We love an unlikely couple here at HuffPost UK, and they don’t come much more unexpected than Perrie Edwards and Joey Essex, who have reportedly been enjoying a series of secret dates. 
The Little Mix singer and former ‘TOWIE’ star met at last month’s Pride Of Britain awards, and it’s now being claimed that they’ve stayed in contact since. 
Perrie attended the awards with her bandmates 
A source tells The Mirror: “It’s very early days, but Perrie likes Joey because he makes her laugh. They are just getting to know each other and taking things slowly, but Joey is already smitten. 
“Perrie has just come out of a serious relationship and is enjoying having fun right now.” 
Since splitting from Zayn Malik in August , Perrie’s been keeping busy, thanks to a packed promo schedule for Little Mix’s upcoming album, ‘Get Weird’. 
It hasn’t all been smooth-sailing though and one of their live performances was briefly halted in late August, when Perrie broke down in tears . 
Joey Essex 
Just days before the incident, Perrie addressed the break-up during an appearance on James Corden’s US talk show , telling the host: ““You know what? I’m good. 
“We’re having an absolute blast in America. Things are going so well and I just wake up every day and I thank my lucky stars I have these three girls.” 
Meanwhile, Joey split from his latest girlfriend just weeks ago. Close   Back in July, Gaga and LiLo had a slumber party at the Chateau Marmont, and Gaga offered praise via Twitter for Lohan's much-criticized performance in "Liz & Dick" this week. In October, the comedian, 37, cheered on David Beckham at and LA Galaxy match along with Victoria Beckham and the couple's children. After the pair reportedly became close on the set of "Scary Movie 5," Sheen gave Lindsay Lohan a $100,000 check to cover her tax dept. After the pair were seen hanging out at Clive Davis' pre-Grammy bash earlier this year, a source told Us Weekly, "Kim and Britney met a few times before. Kim has been to her concert a few times. Britney and Kim love each other." The two actors shared a bromance while shooting "21 Jump Street" earlier this year "I've never met anyone like Jonah that can go in and literally win an entire room and get away with just about anything," Tatum told People. The Bravo host and singer-songwriter were spotted enjoying the fall weather -- and each other's company -- in September. The odd pair got along famously during an interview with Jay Leno. Gingrich congratulated the "Jersey Shore" star on her best-selling literary achievements, and she replied, "Thanks. I'm trying to be like you." The pair professed their mutual admiration for each other at an event for Midler's New York Restoration Project in 2009. "He is such a gorgeous star - holy cow!" Midler told the New York Daily News. "He's like the Godfather of Jamaica, Queens." "When I make my records, he’s one of the first people I send the record to before it’s done," Snoop has said of the soccer star.  Share
